disqualified.help: Entry disqualified for rule violation or technical issues.

imagefile_original.help: Image to use for the entry. Not required, but recommended. Allowed formats: ${imageFormats}.

entry.audioHelp: If your browser can't play the audio, you can download the file below.

error.title: Error
error.text: There seems to be a problem with the Internet. The following may have something to do with it.

session.expired: Your session has expired. Log in at the main site to continue.

voting.atLeastOneRequired: Move at least one entry above the bar to continue.
voting.divider: Arrange entries above this bar to give them points. Entries below are ignored.
voting.hasChanges: Don't forget to save. You can change your votes at any time before the voting deadline.
voting.leaveWithoutSaving: You have unsaved votes. Leave the page anyway?

voteCode.hasCodeForEvent: You have a valid vote code for this event.
voteCode.help: To vote in Kompomaatti, your account must have a vote code for the event. If you bought a ticket online, you can use the ticket's code for this.
voteCode.noTicketCode: I don't have a ticket code
voteCode.requestPendingHelp: If nothing happens for a while, try poking the people at the infodesk.
